title: eJay HipHop 4 v1.01.0011-CHAOS [deepstatus]
description:
eJay HipHop 4 v1.01.0011








In the beginning was HIPHOP eJay, then came HIPHOP eJay 2 and Street Style, and now eJay is proud to present its latest offering in cutting-edge urban music software, HIPHOP eJay 4!

Alongside the hallmarks of eJay technology such as the FX Studio and Groove Generator, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll find a Scratch Box for spinning the virtual vinyl, a Rap Box for recording your own rhymes and a brand new TAG Generator for spraying virtual graffiti! Although HIPHOP eJay 4 boasts many functions, it is still easy to use, meaning you can make your tracks in minutes.



Although HIPHOP eJay 4 boasts many functions, it is still easy to use.

More than 4,000 royalty-free hiphop samples

48-track Arranger

Innovative Scratch Box with virtual turntables

Rap Box Ã¢â‚¬â€œ recording studio

TAG Generator for spraying your own graffiti

FX Studio for modifying samples

______________________________________________________________________________________________



   System Requirements

Windows 7/Vista/XP, DirectX 8.1, 1,5 GHz processor, 512 MB Memory, 680 MB Hard Disk Space




[Installation]

UnRar.

Install ejay_dance6_hiphop_setup.
( choose proper lang in setup window )

Don't launch yet.

Copy the content from Patch folder to installation directory

x64: C:Program Files (x86)eJayHipHop 4
x86: C:Program Files (x86)eJayHipHop 4
